data.name: MONSTER HUNTER RISE - One Character Edit Voucher
data.detailed_description:
'Character Edit Vouchers allow you to change the appearance of a hunter character once per voucher. Use a voucher at the save data select screen to edit the appearance of an existing hunter. Please note that the name of your hunter cannot be changed.

This add-on contains:

- Character Edit Voucher (1)

This ticket gives you a chance to change your character's appearance any way you like.

Note:
- This add-on content can only be obtained once.
- Each voucher is consumed upon saving the edited character.
- You can edit hair, eyebrow colour, facial hair, makeup and clothing from the Item Box without using a voucher.

  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GT 1030 (DDR4) or AMD Radeon™ RX 550
